about_the_game:
Toaster Arena

Toaster Arena is a game that friends can enjoy together, whether they're in the mood for competitive action or just casual fun. It blends old-school, fast-paced gameplay with modern shooter mechanics, creating a unique and thrilling experience. Dive into intense matches that capture the essence of classic games while enjoying the strategic elements of contemporary shooters.

MULTIPLE GAME MODES

Game modes can change the entire experience of the game, offering a variety of play styles to keep things interesting. They range from the chaotic Free For All, where every player is out for themselves, to cooperative team-based modes that require strategy and coordination. For those who love a thrill, there are unique modes like Zombie Infection, where players must survive waves of corrupted attackers. Each mode provides different challenges and dynamics, ensuring that the gameplay remains fresh and engaging no matter how often you play.

VARIED MAPS

The game offers a rich and diverse selection of maps, each uniquely crafted to provide distinct challenges and experiences. From the intense, claustrophobic environments of close-quarters combat maps, where every turn could lead to a surprise encounter.

Custom Loadouts

With more than 10 unique weapons to choose from, players can customize their loadouts to suit their playstyle. The selection ranges from serious, high-powered options like anti-material sniper rifles to quirky, fun choices like cheese slices. Each weapon behaves differently, offering a unique experience and having a significant impact on the battlefield.

CUSTOMIZATION

Choose from a wide selection of parts to build your character, ranging from tails and legs to arms and even hats. Each part can be individually colored, allowing for a multitude of unique combinations. Express your creativity by mixing and matching different elements to design a character that truly represents your unique style and preferences. Whether you want a character with a sleek, cohesive look or a wild, colorful appearance, the customization options are extensive and varied, ensuring that no two characters will ever look the same.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains Violence, Blood and Gore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD R5 340X or NVIDIA equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
  • Additional Notes: Tested at 1080p, lowest settings, 30 fps
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDA GPU with DirectX 12 support
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: No

short_description: Toaster Arena is a first person multiplayer arena shooter where players battle it out on different maps and game modes. Use Advanced movement to traverse obstacles and gain the advantage on the battlefield.
